about_the_game:
(A Game made by one of the %&#@!*$ that worked on The Binding of Isaac: Repentance and Creator of world-famous video game At Least There is Čeda Čedović)

Myths are 100% True is an absurd platformer that feels like X-files if it was made by 12 year olds in Windows Movie Maker. Go to strange locations in this bizarre world and look for its many myths and secrets.

Make money by taking photos of myths no man has ever taken before. Buy power-ups or cosmetics from a strange kind of man for your adventuring needs. The game combines platforming and combat in a way that allows fast and smooth flow of gameplay.

Play as Hlev Pekarovic - a newly hired Photoslav and master of Aggressive Photography. He works for Teorija Tortino, one of the CEOs of Big Myth Company. Only with his skills can he create the world’s biggest documentation of myths and legends!

Play at whatever pace you wish. Get bonus money for going fast or play more thoroughly and make more money from your myth photos. You can do both too if you’re insane enough.

This game is Inspired by not only some really cool games, but many obscure and strange videos from the 2000s; primarily GTA Myth and Legends videos from, like, 2008. As well, It takes inspiration from bits and pieces of other games, like demoknight trimping.

The Demo! That's right, you're on the Demo's page right now! You can play it and even write a review down below, who can stop you?

name: Myths are 100% True Demo
short_description: An absurd platformer where you play as Hlev; master of aggressive photography. In the long year of 20XY, a sudden boom of myths has given Hlev the opportunity to photograph all the myths he wants to make his web videos. Inspired by obscure stuff from the 2000's. Go find the secrets, bre.
